name: get_spouse_name
description: Retrieves the name of spouse.

spouse_of.description: The name of the individual whose spouse's name is being retrieved.

include_maiden_name.description: Whether to include the maiden name in the returned spouse's full name.

name: probability.dice_roll
description: Calculate the probability of rolling a certain number on a six-sided die a certain number of times in a row.

desired_number.description: The number you want to roll.

number_of_rolls.description: How many times you want to roll that number in a row.

die_sides.description: The number of sides on the die (optional; default is 6).

name: instrument_rental_prices
description: Retrieve the current rental prices for a specific musical instrument in a given city.

name: repository_api.update_repository
description: Updates the metadata and settings of an existing repository on the platform.

repository_id.description: The unique identifier of the repository to update.

repository_data.description: A dictionary containing the data to update the repository with.

name.description: The new name of the repository.

description.description: A brief description of the repository.

is_private.description: Flag to make the repository private or public.

default_branch.description: The name of the default branch for the repository.

name: oidc_api.OidcApi.add_mapping_2
description: Adds a new OpenID Connect (OIDC) identity provider to client mapping. This allows the specified client to use the given OIDC provider for authentication.

provider_id.description: The unique identifier of the OIDC provider.

client_id.description: The client identifier for which the mapping is to be added.

client_secret.description: The client secret corresponding to the client identifier. This is an optional parameter.

redirect_uris.description: A list of allowed redirect URIs for the OIDC client. Each URI should be a well-formed URL.

grant_types.description: A list of grant types permitted for the OIDC client, such as 'authorization_code' and 'implicit'.

response_types.description: A list of response types permitted for the OIDC client, such as 'code' or 'token'.

scope.description: The default scope to be requested from the OIDC provider. Typically includes 'openid'.

token_endpoint_auth_method.description: The authentication method to be used at the token endpoint of the OIDC provider. This should match one of the allowed methods supported by the provider.

name: volume_traded
description: Calculate the total volume of stocks traded over a certain period of time

company.description: Name of the company to get data for

days.description: Number of past days to calculate volume traded for

data_source.description: Source to fetch the financial data. default is 'yahoo finance'

name: grocery_store.find_by_criteria
description: Find grocery stores based on specific criteria such as location, hours of operation, or availability of services.

location.description: The city where you want to find a grocery store.

criteria.description: Specific features or services you're looking for in a grocery store.

name: ldap_api.LdapApi.retrieve_ldap_groups
description: Performs a pass-through query to the configured LDAP server to retrieve the distinguished names (DNs) of all accessible groups. The search results are cached according to the default Alpine CacheManager policy.

search_base.description: The base DN from which the search should start. For example, 'dc=example,dc=com'.

search_filter.description: The search filter to apply. For instance, '(objectClass=group)'.

search_scope.description: The scope of the search. Possible values include 'base', 'onelevel', and 'subtree'.

return_attributes.description: A list of attributes to return. For example, ['cn', 'member'].

time_limit.description: Time limit in seconds for the search query. A value of 0 means no limit.

size_limit.description: The maximum number of entries to return. A value of 0 indicates no limit.

cache_policy.description: The caching policy to use for the search results. Default policies could be 'default', 'never', 'always', or 'if_remote'.

name: VulnerabilityApi.get_vulnerabilities_by_component
description: Retrieves a list of all identified vulnerabilities associated with a specific software component, allowing for optional inclusion of suppressed vulnerabilities.

uuid.description: The universally unique identifier (UUID) of the software component for which vulnerabilities are being queried.

suppressed.description: A flag to determine whether suppressed vulnerabilities should be included in the response. Suppressed vulnerabilities are those that have been flagged as false positives or accepted risks.

name: search_on_google
description: Performs a search on Google with various parameters to filter and customize the search results.

c2coff.description: Enables or disables Simplified and Traditional Chinese search. '1' enables, '0' disables.

cr.description: Restrict search results to documents originating from a specific country. Use a country code string like 'countryUS'.

dateRestrict.description: Restricts results to URLs based on date. Formats include 'd[number]' for days, 'w[number]' for weeks, 'm[number]' for months, and 'y[number]' for years.

exactTerms.description: Specifies a phrase that all documents in the search results must contain.

excludeTerms.description: Specifies a word or phrase that should not appear in any document in the search results.

fileType.description: Restricts results to files of a specified extension such as 'pdf', 'doc', etc.

filter.description: Controls the activation or deactivation of the duplicate content filter. '0' disables, '1' enables.

gl.description: End user's geolocation, specified as a two-letter country code, to optimize search results for that country.

highRange.description: Specifies the final value of a search range for the query.

hl.description: Sets the language of the user interface for the search results.

hq.description: Appends specified query terms to the search as if combined with an AND logical operator.

imgColorType.description: Returns images in specified color type: color, grayscale, mono, or transparent.

imgDominantColor.description: Returns images with a specific dominant color.

imgSize.description: Returns images of a specified size.

imgType.description: Returns images of a specified type: clipart, face, lineart, stock, photo, or animated.

linkSite.description: Specifies that all search results must contain a link to a specific URL.

lowRange.description: Specifies the initial value of a search range for the query.

lr.description: Restricts the search to documents written in a specific language, specified by the 'lang_' prefix followed by the ISO two-letter language code.

num.description: The number of search results to return per page. Must be between 1 and 10.

orTerms.description: Provides additional search terms where each document must contain at least one of the terms.

rights.description: Filters based on licensing, such as 'cc_publicdomain' or 'cc_attribute'.

safe.description: The safety level of the search. 'active' enables, 'off' disables SafeSearch filtering.

searchType.description: Specifies the type of search, such as 'image' for image searches.

siteSearch.description: Specifies a particular site to always include or exclude from the results.

siteSearchFilter.description: Controls inclusion or exclusion of results from the site specified in 'siteSearch'. 'e' excludes, 'i' includes.

sort.description: The sorting expression to apply to the results, such as 'sort=date' to sort by date.

start.description: The index of the first search result to return, starting at 1.

name: get_stock_history
description: Finds the price of a stock by its stock name.

stock_name.description: The stock name of the product, in the format of the stock symbol.

interval.description: The interval of the stock history. Allows one of following : 5m|15m|30m|1h|1d|1wk|1mo|3mo

diffandsplits.description: The diff and splits of the stock history. Allows one of following : true|false. Default to false

name: google.books_search
description: Search for a book in the Google Books library with optional parameters

permissions.description: A list of permission strings that define the access level for the user or group on the resource.

expiry_date.description: The expiration date for the ACL mapping in the format 'YYYY-MM-DD'. Optional, defaults to null which indicates no expiration.

This function is particularly useful for clarifying questions with vague terms or pronouns lacking context. It should not be used when the user omits optional information unless that information becomes critical during the conversation.

question.description: The question to be clarified or expanded upon in order to provide the user with an accurate and effective response.

frustrated.description: The response time (in seconds) at which a user action is considered frustrated, indicating an unsatisfactory experience.

name: issue_fields_api.IssueFieldsApi.get_fields_paginated

Allows retrieval of all fields, specific fields by ID, or fields containing a particular string in their name or description. Custom fields are queried by setting the 'type' to 'custom'. Administer Jira global permission is required.

startAt.description: The index of the first item to return in a page of results (page offset).

A return value of 'true' indicates ongoing processing, while 'false' means there is no current processing for the provided token. name: get_sensor_readings_history

startingAfter.description: A server-side token that represents the start of the page, such as a timestamp in the format 'YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ'. This should not be manually set by the client.

endingBefore.description: A server-side token that represents the end of the page, such as a timestamp in the format 'YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ'. This should not be manually set by the client.

networkId.description: The network IDs to filter the returned data. If omitted, data from all networks will be included.

serials.description: Sensor serial numbers to filter the readings by. If omitted, readings from all sensors will be included.

metrics.description: Types of sensor readings to retrieve, such as 'temperature', 'humidity', 'co2'. If omitted, all available types will be retrieved.

timespan.description: The duration for which sensor data will be fetched, specified in seconds. Maximum value corresponds to 730 days and 12 hours.

t0.description: The start of the timespan for the data, in the format 'YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ'. Maximum lookback is 365 days and 6 hours from today.

t1.description: The end of the timespan for the data, in the format 'YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ'. 't1' can be at most 7 days after 't0'.

name: groups_api.GroupsApi.create_group_mapping
description: Creates a mapping between a group from an Identity Provider (IdP) such as LDAP, OIDC, or SAML, and an Instana group. Upon user login, if the IdP is configured and mappings are enabled, the provided key-value pairs from the IdP will be evaluated. If the key-value pairs match the mapping criteria, the user will be automatically assigned to the corresponding Instana group. Note that the 'id' field in the payload is ignored, as Instana will generate a new unique identifier for each mapping.

group_id.description: The unique identifier of the Instana group to which the mapping will be applied.

key.description: The attribute key received from the IdP to be used for mapping.

value.description: The expected value for the specified key that will trigger the mapping to the Instana group.

name: project_property_api.ProjectPropertyApi.get_properties

name: events_api.EventsApi.agent_monitoring_events
description: Retrieves all agent monitoring events within a specified timeframe. It allows for querying historical events and can filter events based on their state updates. Users can define the timeframe using 'to', 'from', and 'windowSize' parameters.

to.description: The end of the requested timeframe as a Unix timestamp in seconds. If not provided, defaults to the current service time.

_from.description: The start of the requested timeframe as a Unix timestamp in seconds, defining a range [from, to). This is an alternative to 'windowSize'. If neither 'from' nor 'windowSize' is provided, defaults to 10 minutes before the 'to' timestamp.

windowSize.description: The size of the requested timeframe in milliseconds, relative to the 'to' parameter. If neither 'windowSize' nor 'from' is provided, defaults to 600000 milliseconds (10 minutes).

excludeTriggeredBefore.description: Excludes events triggered before the requested timeframe. Useful for integrations that require only new events starting within the timeframe.

filterEventUpdates.description: Filters the results to include only event updates. Events are included only if their state changed within the requested timeframe. Suitable for integrations that are interested in event state updates.

name: map_service.get_directions

types.description: A comma-separated list of conversation types to include. For example, 'public_channel,private_channel'.

exclude_archived.description: Flag indicating whether to exclude archived conversations from the list. Set to '1' to exclude.

cursor.description: A cursor value used to paginate through the list of conversations. If there are more items than the limit, this cursor can be used to fetch the next page of results.

assumeMajor.description: Assumption if the key signature is Major. If true, the function will assume the key signature to be major and otherwise minor. Default is true.

name: events_api.EventsApi.kubernetes_info_events
description: Retrieve all Kubernetes info events within the specified timeframe. Events can be filtered to show only updates or exclude events triggered before the timeframe. Suitable for 3rd party integrations fetching events in scheduled batches.

to.description: The end of the requested timeframe as a Unix timestamp.

windowSize.description: The size of the requested timeframe in milliseconds relative to 'to'. Defaults to 10 minutes (600,000 milliseconds) if neither 'windowSize' nor 'from' is provided.

_from.description: The start of the requested timeframe as a Unix timestamp, defining the range [from, to). Optional. If not provided, defaults to 'to' minus 'windowSize'.

excludeTriggeredBefore.description: Exclude events that were triggered before the requested timeframe. Useful for only searching events that started within the given timeframe. Defaults to false.

filterEventUpdates.description: Filter results to only include event updates that occurred within the given timeframe. Defaults to false.

endingBefore.description: Server-generated token indicating the end of the page, typically a timestamp or ID.

networkId.description: Filter data by the specified network IDs.

metrics.description: Specify sensor reading types to retrieve, such as 'temperature', 'humidity', 'pressure'. Defaults to all available types if not supplied.

timespan.description: The timespan for fetching data, in seconds. The maximum is equivalent to 730 days and 12 hours.

t0.description: Start of the data timespan, in the ISO 8601 format 'YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ'. The maximum lookback period is 730 days and 12 hours.

t1.description: End of the data timespan, in the ISO 8601 format 'YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ'. This can be a maximum of 730 days and 12 hours after t0.

interval.description: The time interval in seconds for the data returned. Valid values are 15, 120, 300, 900, 3600, 14400, 86400, or 604800.

models.description: Filter readings by one or more sensor models. Available models include 'MT10', 'MT11', 'MT12', 'MT14', 'MT20', 'MT30'.

name: events_api.EventsApi.get_events

_from.description: Alternative to 'windowSize', defines the start of the timeframe in Unix timestamp format. The query spans the range ['from', 'to').

filterEventUpdates.description: Filters results to event updates that occurred within the query timeframe. Defaults to 'false'.

includeAgentMonitoringIssues.description: Include Agent Monitoring Issues in the results. This parameter is deprecated. Defaults to 'false'.

name: agent_monitoring_events

_from.description: The start of the requested timeframe as a Unix timestamp. If not provided, defaults to 'to' minus 'windowSize'. Defines the timeframe in range ['from', 'to').

excludeTriggeredBefore.description: If set to true, excludes events that were triggered before the requested timeframe. This enables searching for new events that started within the given timeframe. Useful for batch jobs that operate on fixed intervals.

filterEventUpdates.description: If set to true, filters the results to event updates only, including an event only if its state changed within the query timeframe. Useful for batch jobs that need to track event state updates.

name: searchCVE
description: Builds and sends a GET request to retrieve a list of CVEs (Common Vulnerabilities and Exposures) based on specified criteria. Date and time strings should be formatted as 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM', for example, '2023-03-01 00:00'.

cpeName.description: CPE (Common Platform Enumeration) name to match against CVE applicability statements. Use 'cpe' prefix, supports partial matches.

cveId.description: Unique identifier for a CVE, formatted as a string.

cvssV2Metrics.description: CVSSv2 vector string to filter CVEs by their CVSSv2 metrics. Full or partial strings accepted. Incompatible with cvssV3Metrics parameter.

cvssV2Severity.description: Filter CVEs by CVSSv2 severity levels.

cvssV3Metrics.description: CVSSv3 vector string to filter CVEs by their CVSSv3 metrics. Full or partial strings accepted. Incompatible with cvssV2Metrics parameter.

cvssV3Severity.description: Filter CVEs by CVSSv3 severity levels.

cweId.description: Filter CVEs by CWE ID. Example: 'CWE-34'.

hasCertAlerts.description: Return CVEs containing a Technical Alert from US-CERT.

hasCertNotes.description: Return CVEs containing a Vulnerability Note from CERT/CC.

hasOval.description: Return CVEs containing OVAL information from MITRE.

isVulnerable.description: Return vulnerable CVEs associated with a specific CPE. Requires cpeName parameter.

keywordExactMatch.description: Enforce exact match for keywordSearch. Requires keywordSearch.

keywordSearch.description: Search for CVEs with specific words or phrases in their description. Supports multiple keywords.

lastModStartDate.description: Filter CVEs modified after this date and time. Format: 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM'. Must be used in conjunction with lastModEndDate.

lastModEndDate.description: Filter CVEs modified before this date and time. Format: 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM'. Must be used in conjunction with lastModStartDate.

noRejected.description: Exclude rejected CVEs from the search results.

pubStartDate.description: Filter CVEs published after this date and time. Format: 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM'. Must be used in conjunction with pubEndDate.

pubEndDate.description: Filter CVEs published before this date and time. Format: 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM'. Must be used in conjunction with pubStartDate.

sourceIdentifier.description: Filter CVEs by their data source identifier.

versionEnd.description: Filter CVEs by the end of a version range. Must be used with versionEndType and virtualMatchString.

versionEndType.description: Include or exclude the version specified in versionEnd. Must be used with versionEnd and virtualMatchString.

versionStart.description: Filter CVEs by the start of a version range. Must be used with versionStartType and virtualMatchString.

versionStartType.description: Include or exclude the version specified in versionStart. Must be used with versionStart and virtualMatchString.

virtualMatchString.description: Broad filter against CPE Match Criteria in CVE applicability statements.

limit.description: Limit the number of search results. Range: 1 to 2000.

delay.description: Define a delay between requests in seconds. Must be greater than 0.6 seconds. Recommended: 6 seconds.

key.description: API key for NVD access. Required. Recommended delay between requests: 6 seconds.

verbose.description: Print the URL request for debugging purposes.

t0.description: Start of the data timespan as a timestamp in ISO 8601 format (e.g., '2023-04-05T14:30:00Z'). Maximum lookback is 365 days from today.

stats_fields.description: List of statistical categories to be fetched, including total points, total assists, total rebounds, turnovers.

name: imdb.find_movies_by_actor
description: Searches the database to find all movies by a specific actor within a certain year.

year.description: The specific year to search in.

category.description: The category of the film (e.g. Drama, Comedy, etc). This parameter is optional. Default is all if not specified.

name: ClassFileFinder.findClassFile
description: Finds the class file for a given class name within the specified class path and returns the path to the class file.

name.description: The fully qualified name of the class to find.

classPath.description: The class path where to search for the class file, with paths separated by the system path separator.

name: Hotels_2_BookHouse
description: Books a selected house for a specified duration and number of adults.

where_to.description: The location of the house to book, in the format of 'City, State', such as 'San Francisco, CA'.

number_of_adults.description: The number of adults to include in the reservation.

check_in_date.description: The check-in date for the reservation in the format 'MM/DD/YYYY'.

check_out_date.description: The check-out date for the reservation in the format 'MM/DD/YYYY'.

name: music_theory.primary_triads
description: Get the primary triads for a given key signature.

key_signature.description: The key signature to calculate the primary triads for.

include_inversions.description: Whether or not to include inversions in the returned triads.

name: probability.coin_toss_heads
description: Calculate the probability of getting a specific number of heads after tossing a coin multiple times.

coin_tosses.description: The number of times the coin is tossed.

heads_needed.description: The specific number of heads you want to get after coin tosses.

coin_type.description: The type of the coin. Default is 'fair'. Possible values are 'fair', 'double_heads', 'double_tails'.

name: DynamicChartGenerator
description: This function creates a dynamic chart based on user input, applies a scaling factor to the axis values, and integrates the chart into a specified dashboard for display.

userData.description: The data provided by the user to plot on the chart.

scalingFactor.description: A scaling factor applied to the chart's axis values. Optional parameter.

dashboard.description: The dashboard where the chart will be displayed.

options.description: Additional configuration options for the chart. Default empty dict

name: vt_get_object_descriptors_related_to_ip_address
description: Retrieve descriptors for objects related to a given IP address, such as associated URLs, files, or domains. The descriptors provide detailed information about the relationships and can be used for further analysis.

ip.description: The IP address for which related object descriptors are to be retrieved.

relationship.description: The type of relationship to filter the object descriptors by.

x_apikey.description: The API key used for authentication to access the service.

limit.description: The maximum number of object descriptors to retrieve.

cursor.description: A pagination cursor that points to the starting position of the result set to fetch.

name: soccer_stats.get_last_match_result
description: Retrieve the results of the most recent match between two football teams.

team1.description: The name of the first team.

team2.description: The name of the second team.

season.description: The football season in question (Optional). Default: 'spring'

name: statistics.mode
description: This function determines the mode of a list of numbers.

name: game_valuation
description: Get the current market value of a vintage video game.

release_year.description: The year the game was released.

condition.description: The condition of the game. Default is 'Used'.

name: restaurant.find_nearby
description: Locate nearby restaurants based on specific criteria like cuisine type.

location.description: The city and state, e.g. Seattle, WA

cuisine.description: Preferred type of cuisine in restaurant.

max_distance.description: Maximum distance (in miles) within which to search for restaurants. Default is 5.

name: MaintenanceConfigurationApi.get_maintenance_config
description: Retrieve the maintenance configuration settings for a specific system identified by its ID.

id.description: The unique identifier of the system for which maintenance configuration is being retrieved.

name: celebrity_net_worth.get
description: Get the total net worth of a sports celebrity based on most recent data.

name.description: The full name of the sports celebrity.

currency.description: The currency in which the net worth will be returned. Default is 'USD'.

name: authenticate_twitter
description: This tool belongs to the TwitterAPI, which provides core functionality for posting tweets, retweeting, commenting, and following users on Twitter. Tool description: Authenticate a user with username and password.

username.description: Username of the user.

name: LibraryExport.createDelegate
description: Creates a delegate library instance using the provided factory and delegate. If the delegate is not adoptable, it forces adoption to ensure proper parent pointer implementation.

factory.description: The factory used to create a new delegate instance of the library.

delegate.description: The existing delegate instance of the library.

name: music_shop.find_nearby
description: Locate nearby music shops based on specific criteria like instrument lessons availability.

location.description: The city and state, e.g. Nashville, TN

services.description: Types of instrument lessons offered in the shop. Default empty array

instruments.description: Types of instruments sold in the shop. Default empty array

name: get_current_loc
description: Retrieves the current geographical location of the device, returning the coordinates as longitude and latitude values.

coordinate_format.description: The desired format for the returned coordinates, such as 'degrees' or 'DMS' (degrees, minutes, seconds).

include_altitude.description: Specifies whether to include altitude information in the location data.

timeout.description: The maximum time to wait for a location in seconds.

name: users_setActive
description: Set the user's active status in the system using their unique token.

token.description: A unique authentication token identifying the user.

name: us_history.get_event_info
description: Retrieve detailed information about a significant event in U.S. history.

specific_info.description: Specific aspect of information related to event.

name: api.weather
description: Retrieve current weather information for a specified location.

loc.description: The location for which weather information is to be retrieved, in the format of 'City, Country' (e.g., 'Paris, France').

name: calculate_resistance
description: Calculate the resistance of a wire using resistivity, length, and cross-sectional area.

length.description: The length of the wire in meters.

area.description: The cross-sectional area of the wire in square meters.

resistivity.description: Resistivity of the material (Default: 'copper'). Allowed values: 'copper', 'aluminum'

name: algebra.quadratic_roots
description: Find the roots of a quadratic equation ax^2 + bx + c = 0.

a.description: Coefficient of x^2.

name: SyntheticSettingsApi.get_synthetic_location
description: Retrieves the details of a synthetic monitoring location based on the specified identifier.

id.description: The unique identifier for the synthetic monitoring location.

name: EventSettingsApi.create_website_alert_config
description: This API endpoint creates a configuration for website alerts, allowing users to define the conditions under which an alert is triggered and optionally create an associated incident.

name.description: The name for the website alert configuration.

description.description: A brief description of the website alert configuration.

severity.description: The severity level of the alert when triggered. Can be either 5 for a Warning or 10 for Critical.

triggering.description: A flag indicating whether an Incident is also triggered when the alert is triggered.

websiteId.description: The unique identifier of the website for which the alert configuration is created.

tagFilterExpression.description: A boolean expression of tag filters used to define the scope of relevant website beacons.

granularity.description: The evaluation granularity in minutes, defining the size of the tumbling window used for detection of threshold violations.

rule.description: The type of rule this alert configuration represents, such as 'traffic spike' or 'downtime'.

threshold.description: The value of the threshold this alert rule is evaluated against.

timeThreshold.description: The time period in minutes for which the threshold must be violated to trigger the alert.

alertChannelIds.description: A list of unique identifiers for alert channels defined in Instana to which the alert notifications will be sent.

name: get_activity_by_type
description: Retrieves an event within a specified range of accessibility, where the range is inclusive and the accessibility is represented by a value between 0.0 (most accessible) and 1.0 (least accessible).

min_accessibility.description: The minimum accessibility value for the event, ranging from 0.0 (most accessible) to 1.0 (least accessible).

max_accessibility.description: The maximum accessibility value for the event, ranging from 0.0 (most accessible) to 1.0 (least accessible).

event_type.description: The type of event to filter by.

name: HNA_WQA.search

keyword.description: The search term used by the HNA WQA to find relevant information on the web.

result_format.description: The desired format of the search results.

language.description: The language preference for the search results.

max_results.description: Maximum number of search results to return.

name: get_product_details
description: Retrieve detailed information about a specific product, including options for size, color, material, and care instructions.

item_id.description: The unique identifier of the product, required to fetch specific product details.

color.description: The color of the product. Specify this parameter to filter product details by color.

size.description: The size of the product. Specify this parameter to filter product details by size.

detailLevel.description: The level of detail required for the product information. Use 'SKU' for size and color details.

material.description: The material of the product. This parameter is optional and can be used to filter product details.

care_instructions.description: Whether to include care instructions in the product details. If true, care instructions will be included.

name: flight.book
description: Book a direct flight for a specific date and time from departure location to destination location.

departure_location.description: The location you are departing from.

destination_location.description: The location you are flying to.

date.description: The date of the flight. Accepts standard date format e.g., 2022-04-28.

time.description: Preferred time of flight. Format XX:XXAM or XX:XXPM. Default ''

direct_flight.description: If set to true, only direct flights will be searched. Default is false

name: find_recipes
description: Find recipes based on dietary restrictions, meal type, and preferred ingredients.

ingredients.description: The preferred ingredients. If left blank, it will default to return general recipes.

name: finish
description: Translate a given text from one language to another using the NLLB (Neural Language Learning Bridges) model.

input_text.description: The text you want to translate.

tgt_lang.description: The target language code, following the BCP 47 standard, such as 'en' for English, 'zh' for Chinese.

src_lang.description: The source language code, following the BCP 47 standard, such as 'en' for English, 'zh' for Chinese.

max_length.description: The maximum number of characters for the translated text. Excess text will be truncated.

access_token.description: The access token required to authenticate with the Hugging Face API for translation.

name: law_case_search
description: Search and retrieve law cases based on the topic, timeline, and location.

topic.description: The subject matter of the case.

year_range.description: The start and end year for searching cases.

location.description: The location where the case is being heard.

judicial_system.description: The specific judicial system in which to search (e.g. 'federal', 'state').

name: get_customer_bookings
description: Retrieve a list of customer bookings with optional filters for latest, professional-only, and specific date bookings.

is_latest_booking.description: Flag to filter for the latest booking of the customer. False (0) does not require, True (1) is required.

is_no_professional_booking.description: Flag to filter out bookings that are not taken by service providers. False (0) does not require, True (1) is required.

service_date.description: The service appointment date of customer bookings, in the format of 'YYYY-MM-DD'.

is_no_datetime_booking.description: Flag to filter for bookings that do not have an appointment date set. False (0) does not require, True (1) is required.

name: thermodynamics.calculate_boiling_point
description: Calculate the boiling point of a given substance at a specific pressure.

substance.description: The substance for which to calculate the boiling point.

pressure.description: The pressure at which to calculate the boiling point.

unit.description: The unit of the pressure. Default is 'kPa'.

name: CookieHeaderTest.create
description: Creates a DummyServer instance with SSL support using the provided socket address and SSL context.

sa.description: The socket address to bind the server to. This is an InetSocketAddress object that has a constructor taking first field as ip address, such as 192.168.1.1, as a string and taking second field is socket address such as 8000

sslContext.description: The SSL context to be used for creating the server socket.

name: analyze_image_with_question.pipeline
description: This function takes an image file and a question related to the image, and uses a machine learning pipeline to analyze the image and answer the question.

image_path.description: The file path to the image to be analyzed.

question.description: A question in plain English related to the contents of the image.

name: calculate_maximum_height
description: Calculate the maximum height an object will reach if it's thrown straight upwards with an initial velocity, ignoring air resistance.

initial_velocity.description: The initial velocity in meters per second.

gravity.description: The acceleration due to gravity in meters per second squared, default value is 9.8.

name: tts_tool
description: Converts the provided text content to speech and saves the resulting audio to a file. This function is intended for voice narration and should be used accordingly.

content.description: The text content that needs to be converted to speech.

speaker.description: The voice to be used for the text-to-speech conversion.

file_name.description: The name of the file to save the audio output without the extension. If left empty, a default name will be generated based on the content.

name: ApplicationAnalyzeApi.get_trace_download
description: Retrieves detailed information about a trace with a specified ID, allowing for optional pagination.

id.description: The unique identifier for the trace.

retrievalSize.description: The number of trace entries to retrieve in one call. Defaults to 100 if not specified.

offset.description: The offset from the start of the trace data used for paginating results. Defaults to 0 to start from the beginning.

ingestionTime.description: The timestamp representing when the trace was ingested. Format should be in UTC ISO 8601, such as '2023-01-15T00:00:00Z'. If not specified, defaults to the current time.

name: get_alerts
description: Retrieve a list of all alert configurations from the event settings API.

include_disabled.description: If set to true, the response will include alert configurations that are currently disabled.

filter.description: A string to filter the alert configurations by name or description.

limit.description: The maximum number of alert configurations to retrieve.

offset.description: The number of alert configurations to skip before starting to collect the result set.

name: banking_service
description: Make a deposit to a given bank account

account_id.description: Target account to make deposit to.

amount.description: Amount to deposit.

name: calculate_heat
description: Calculate the heat required to raise the temperature of a substance using its specific heat.

mass.description: The mass of the substance in kilograms.

specific_heat.description: The specific heat of the substance in J/kg.°C. For water, it is 4.184 J/kg.°C

change_in_temp.description: The change in temperature in degrees Celsius.

name: ChaDri.change_drink
description: Modifies the existing drink order to accommodate the customer's new request, ensuring the drink is updated according to the specified preferences.

drink_id.description: The unique identifier of the drink to be changed.

new_preferences.description: The updated preferences for the drink order.

size.description: The size of the drink the customer prefers.

temperature.description: The temperature at which the drink should be served.

sweetness_level.description: The sweetness level the customer requests for the drink.

milk_type.description: The type of milk to be used in the drink, if applicable.

special_instructions.description: Any additional instructions provided by the customer for the drink preparation.

name: find_flights
description: Searches for available flights between an origin and a destination on a specified date for a given number of passengers.

origin.description: The three-letter IATA code of the origin airport, such as 'SFO' for San Francisco International Airport.

destination.description: The three-letter IATA code of the destination airport, similar to the origin format.

date.description: The departure date of the flight in the format YYYY-MM-DD, such as '2023-04-15'.

passengers.description: The total number of passengers traveling.

name: dice_roll_probability
description: Calculate the probability of a specific sum appearing from rolling two dice.

desired_sum.description: The sum for which to calculate the probability.

n_rolls.description: Number of dice to be rolled. Default is 1

sides_per_die.description: Number of sides on each die.
